QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese or wine.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Luis Brunel

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Expecting the world to treat you fairly because you are a good person is a little like expecting the bull not to attack you because you are a vegetarian.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Dennis Wholey

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: The only place success comes before work is in the English dictionary.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Vince Lombardi

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Whatever you do, always give 100%. Unless you're donating blood.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Bill Murray

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Two forks are better than one.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Balnur

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Whoever said that money can’t buy happiness, simply didn’t know where to go shopping.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Bo Derek

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: So be wise, because the world needs more wisdom, and if you cannot be wise, pretend to be someone who is wise, and then just behave like they would.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Neil Gaiman

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn’t hurt.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Charles M. Schulz

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: People say that money is not the key to happiness, but I always figured if you have enough money, you can have a key made.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Joan Rivers

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Those people who think they know everything are a great annoyance to those of us who do.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Isaac Asimov

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: The reason I talk to myself is because I’m the only one whose answers I accept.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: George Carlin

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: I like work. It fascinates me. I can sit and look at it for hours.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Jerome K. Jerome

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Trying is the first step toward failure.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Homer Simpson

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day, you may eventually get to be boss and work 12 hours a day.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Robert Frost

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Adults are always asking children what they want to be when they grow up because they’re looking for ideas.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Paula Poundstone

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: The best way to appreciate your job is to imagine yourself without one.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Oscar Wilde

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: 'Fries or salad?' sums up every adult decision you have to make.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Aparna Nancherla

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Love is being stupid together.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Paul Valery

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Winston Churchill

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Do or do not. There is no try.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Yoda, from Star Wars

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: When sh!t happens turn it into fertilizer.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Unknown

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: After Tuesday, even the calendar goes W T F.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Unknown

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Why be moody when you can shake yo booty?
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Unknown

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Life is short. Buy the shoes.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Unknown

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: People who wonder whether the glass is half empty or half full are missing the point. The glass is refillable.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Unknown

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: There is no angry way to say bubbles.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Unknown

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: The elevator to success is out of order. You’ll have to use the stairs, one step at a time.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Joe Girard

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Lily Tomlin

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don’t understand a single word of what I am saying.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Oscar Wilde

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Be happy – it drives people crazy.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Unknown

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: I believe that if life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade… And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Ron White

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: A diamond is merely a lump of coal that did well under pressure.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Unknown

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible!'
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Audrey Hepburn

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Whoever is able to anger you is able to control you.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Unknown

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: When you let anger get the best of you, it brings out the worst in you.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Unknown

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Holding onto anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Buddha

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: You will not be punished for your anger; you will be punished by your anger.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Buddha

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Anger is a wind which blows out the lamp of the mind.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: You need a hug!
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Jonathan Zeman

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: You look so cute when you're angry!
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Jonathan Zeman

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to suffering.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Yoda, from Star Wars

QuoteOfTheDay.quote: The greatest teacher, failure is.
QuoteOfTheDay.author: Yoda, from Star Wars

SongOfTheDay.title: I Think I Left the Stove On
SongOfTheDay.album: I Think I Left the Stove On

SongOfTheDay.title: Adieux
SongOfTheDay.album: Les rencontres d'apres minuit / You and the Night

SongOfTheDay.title: Heaven Takes You Home (feat. Connie Constance)
SongOfTheDay.artist: Swedish House Mafia and Connie Constance

SongOfTheDay.title: How You Feel (Ft. Leven Kali)
SongOfTheDay.artist: ANOTR and Erik Bandt and Leven Kali
